alert.note: Alert for Adams; Claiborne; Copiah; Franklin; Jefferson; Lincoln (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 5:54PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Claiborne, central Lincoln, Jefferson, Franklin, Adams and southwestern Copiah Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 554 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mcnair, or near Fayette, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Blue Hill around 605 PM CDT. Union Church and New Hope around 610 PM CDT. Pleasant Hill around 615 PM CDT. Caseyville and Allen around 620 PM CDT. Loyd Star and Vaughn around 630 PM CDT. Brookhaven and Wesson around 640 PM CDT. Beauregard around 645 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northeastern Louisiana...and central, south central and southwestern Mississippi.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Claiborne; Copiah; Franklin; Jefferson; Lincoln
